org.daisy.pipeline.braille.common

Interface BrailleTranslator.LineBreakingFromStyledText

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBrailleTranslator.util.DefaultLineBreaker
    Enclosing interface:
    BrailleTranslator

    public static interface BrailleTranslator.LineBreakingFromStyledText

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default BrailleTranslator.LineIterator transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledText)
      Transform a sequence of CSSStyledText to braille, in the form of a BrailleTranslator.LineIterator, which is an interface for laying out text into lines.
      BrailleTranslator.LineIterator transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledTextWithContext, int from, int to)
      Transform the part of the input sequence between index from (included) and index to (not included).

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        default BrailleTranslator.LineIterator transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledText)
                                          throws TransformationException
        Transform a sequence of CSSStyledText to braille, in the form of a BrailleTranslator.LineIterator, which is an interface for laying out text into lines.
        Throws:
        TransformationException

      • transform

        BrailleTranslator.LineIterator transform(Iterable<CSSStyledText> styledTextWithContext,
                                         int from,
                                         int to)
                                  throws TransformationException
        Transform the part of the input sequence between index from (included) and index to (not included). If to is a negative number it means transform up until the last segment.
        Throws:
        TransformationException
